description: Cooked as it is here, a turkey will be juicy and delicious. Larger birds are much more difficult to cook correctly.
keywords: Roast turkey,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Turkey,Peanut free
name: Simple Roast Turkey Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 160°C (Gas 3). Remove any giblets from inside the turkey and use them to make a stock.

Weigh the turkey, so you can calculate its cooking time, then place it in a large roasting tin. Smear the breast with the butter, and season the bird well inside and out. Pop the thyme into the cavity.
Place greaseproof paper over the breast of the turkey, then cover it with a large sheet of foil, sealing it to the roasting tin so no steam will escape.

Roast the turkey for 15 minutes per 450g of weight. Remove the foil for the last 30 minutes and increase the oven temperature to 200°C (Gas 6), so the skin can brown nicely. Remove the turkey from the oven and rest it, covered in foil, for at least 30 minutes before serving.
